description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below...
full_summary:
=====================================

**Publish Notice**
---------------

*   **Reference Number**: PW-23-01030870
*   **Publication Date**: March 27, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: May 9, 2023 (02:00 PM EST)

**Project Details**
-----------------

The Department of National Defence is inviting bidders to submit proposals for a demineralizer, water, ion exchange system. The delivery locations are 25 Canadian Forces Support Establishment Montreal (CFSD) and 7 Canadian Forces Support Establishment Edmonton.

**Required Items**
-----------------

Item 1: Single unit

*   GSIN: N4610
*   NSN: 4610-01-313-6085
*   Quantity: 50
*   Unit of issue: EA
*   Delivery location: 25 CFSD Montreal

Item 2: Single unit

*   GSIN: N4610
*   NSN: 4610-01-313-6085
*   Quantity: 50
*   Unit of issue: EA
*   Delivery location: 7 CFSD Edmonton

**Additional Instructions**
-------------------------

Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number and the NCAGE they are offering.

**Delivery and Submissions**
-------------------------

Delivery is requested by September 2023. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Bidders are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically via epost Connect.

**Important Contacts**
--------------------

*   Contracting authority: Department of National Defence
*   Contact person: Debbie Bergeron
*   Email: debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca

**Attachment**
-------------

Attachments are available on the Canadabuys website ([link])

**Trade Agreements**
-----------------

This solicitation aligns with the terms of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is open to participation from all qualified bidders.

We appreciate your attention to the details in this notice. If you have any questions, please contact the contracting authority directly.

**Procurement Details**
---------------------

The solicitation is categorized as a Competitive-Open Bidding procurement process. Proposals will be evaluated on the basis of their technical merit, price, and other criteria as outlined in the solicitation document.

Thank you for your interest in this procurement opportunity. Good luck with your bid submission.
